aristaQueueMIB.name: aristaQueueMIB

revisions.description: Updated postal and e-mail addresses. Updated descriptions for PacketType, DropPrecedence, and aristaEgressQueueTable.

aristaQueueMIB.contactinfo: Arista Networks, Inc. Postal: 5453 Great America Parkway Santa Clara, CA 95054 Tel: +1 408 547-5500 E-mail: snmp@arista.com
aristaQueueMIB.description: The MIB module is for managing interface queuing on Arista devices. Arista Networks has a number of products. This MIB generalizes ingress and egress queue counters supported on all Arista products. Therefore, a platform may not support all table indices and counters listed in this MIB. For example, ingressQueueIndex in aristaIngressQueueTable, aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedQFull, aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedNoBuffer, and aristaEgressQueueDropPrec in aristaEgressQueueTable are not supported in 7050 series switches.

QueueIndex.name: QueueIndex
QueueIndex.description: A unique value for each queue in an interface in the managed system.

PacketType.name: PacketType
PacketType.description: The packet type of the packets in a queue in an interface in the managed system. It is recommended that there are three packet types of packets in a queue: unicast, multicast, mixed packet type.

DropPrecedence.name: DropPrecedence
DropPrecedence.description: The drop precedences of the packets in a queue in an interface in the managed system. It is recommended that there are three levels of drop precedences of packets in a queue: DropPrecedence0, DropPrecedence1, and DropPrecedence2. When congestion occurs, packets marked with DropPrecedence2 are dropped first; packets marked with DropPrecedence0 are dropped last.

aristaIngressQueueTable.name: aristaIngressQueueTable
aristaIngressQueueTable.description: This table contains statistical information of the ingress queue in an interface.

aristaIngressQueueEntry.name: aristaIngressQueueEntry
aristaIngressQueueEntry.description: A list of attributes of ingress queues in an interface. The attributes include dropped packets and dropped bytes of ingress queues.

aristaIngressQueueIndex.name: aristaIngressQueueIndex
aristaIngressQueueIndex.description: The index of ingress queues in the interface. In the case that the ingress queue information is the sum of the statistics of all ingress queues, the queueIndex is set as zero.

aristaIngressQueuePktsDropped.name: aristaIngressQueuePktsDropped
aristaIngressQueuePktsDropped.description: The number of dropped packets due to congestion at the ingress port in an interface.

aristaIngressQueueBytesDropped.name: aristaIngressQueueBytesDropped
aristaIngressQueueBytesDropped.description: The number of dropped bytes due to congestion at the ingress port in an interface.

aristaEgressQueueTable.name: aristaEgressQueueTable
aristaEgressQueueTable.description: This table contains statistical objects for the egress queues of an interface.

aristaEgressQueueEntry.name: aristaEgressQueueEntry
aristaEgressQueueEntry.description: A list of statistical information of egress queues in an interface. The statistical information includes transmitted packets, transmitted bytes, dropped packets, and dropped bytes of egress queues.

aristaEgressQueueIndex.name: aristaEgressQueueIndex
aristaEgressQueueIndex.description: The index of egress queues in the interface.

aristaEgressPacketType.name: aristaEgressPacketType
aristaEgressPacketType.description: The type of destination of packets in an egress queue in an interface.

aristaEgressQueuePkts.name: aristaEgressQueuePkts
aristaEgressQueuePkts.description: The number of transmitted packets in the egress queue.

aristaEgressQueueBytes.name: aristaEgressQueueBytes
aristaEgressQueueBytes.description: The number of transmitted bytes in the egress queue.

aristaEgressQueuePktsDropped.name: aristaEgressQueuePktsDropped
aristaEgressQueuePktsDropped.description: The number of packets discarded from this egress queue.

aristaEgressQueueBytesDropped.name: aristaEgressQueueBytesDropped
aristaEgressQueueBytesDropped.description: The number of bytes discarded from this egress queue.

aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedQFull.name: aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedQFull
aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedQFull.description: The number of packets discarded from this egress queue when the queue is full.

aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedNoBuffer.name: aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedNoBuffer
aristaEgressQueuePktsDroppedNoBuffer.description: The number of packets discarded from this egress queue when there is no buffer.

aristaEgressQueueDropPrec.name: aristaEgressQueueDropPrec
aristaEgressQueueDropPrec.description: The drop precedence of packets in this egress queue.

aristaQueueCounterCompliance.name: aristaQueueCounterCompliance
aristaQueueCounterCompliance.description: The compliance statement for Arista switches that support queue counters.

aristaQueueCounterGroup.name: aristaQueueCounterGroup
aristaQueueCounterGroup.description: The group of required objects in aristaIngressQueueTable and aristaEgressQueueTable.
